title: BRIEF-Avesoro Resources Says No Injuries Or Equipment Damage From Pit Wall And Ramp Failure in Liberty Gold Mine
text:
BRIEF-Avesoro Resources Says No Injuries Or Equipment Damage From Pit Wall And Ramp Failure in Liberty Gold Mine

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 02:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Avesoro Resources Says No Injuries Or Equipment Damage From Pit Wall And Ramp Failure in Liberty Gold Mine Oct 3 (Reuters) - Avesoro Resources Inc : * PIT WALL AND RAMP FAILURE OCCURRED IN KINJOR PIT AT CO'S NEW LIBERTY GOLD MINE IN LIBERIA ON TUESDAY * THERE WERE NO INJURIES OR EQUIPMENT DAMAGE ARISING FROM PIT WALL AND RAMP FAILURE * MINING ACTIVITIES WITHIN KINJOR-EAST PIT HAVE BEEN SUSPENDED PENDING ASSESSMENT OF IMPACT OF PIT WALL AND RAMP FAILURE * AVESORO RESOURCES INC - ORE PRODUCTION VOLUMES WILL BE REDUCED FOR SOME TIME AS A RESULT OF EVENT

BRIEF-Avesoro Resources Says No Injuries Or Equipment Damage From Pit Wall And Ramp Failure in Liberty Gold Mine
description: BRIEF-Avesoro Resources Says No Injuries Or Equipment Damage From Pit Wall And Ramp Failure in Liberty Gold Mine
